name: Derrick Jackson
background: Former Rome City Commissioner and community organizer from Northwest Georgia. Represents rural Democratic voice often underrepresented in statewide races. Focus on economic development in rural communities and bridging urban-rural divide. 22-year U.S. Navy veteran, corporate general manager, and Adjunct Professor. Serves as Democratic member of Georgia House, District 68.
keyIssues: Rural economic development and job creation
